data.title: Virtual Boston ARTCC
data.meta_description: This website is for VATSIM's Virtual Boston ARTCC
data.text:
Time: 16:00 - 23:00

Participating in poker? Looking to win some fantastic prizes? Book your flight here: https://teaparty.bostonartcc.net

The 16th Annual Boston Tea Party is coming! On Saturday, August 8th, Boston's finest controllers will gather on the campus of Daniel Webster College in Nashua, NH for the 16th consecutive year as we present our own Boston Tea Party! ZBW airspace will be fully staffed for our premier event and we will have some fantastic prizes lined up as well. Visit the Tea Party page for details.

Greetings from the Virtual Boston ARTCC! If you'd like to request vZBW to host an event, or staff up for an event that your VA/group is holding, please send an email with the details (date, times, departure/arrival airports, number of participants, etc.) to [email protected]. To view our currently planned events, see our forum or the calendar located under the Events tab at the top of the page.

Thank you,

Camden Bruno

vZBW Events Coordinator
